other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is tense with two large roughly 1.8 cm gallstones with surrounding sludge, wall thickening up to 5 mm, and trace perihepatic/pericholecystic fluid. The common bile duct is normal in caliber measuring 4 mm. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation.
NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
